new_items.en_definition: slow to act; intended to cause delay
new_items.example_en: The board took a dilatory approach to the safety fix.
new_items.example_zh: 董事會對安全修正一再拖延。
new_items.label: new

new_items.example_en: A perfidious partner leaked the strategy.
new_items.example_zh: 一位不忠的夥伴洩了策略。
new_items.label: new

new_items.example_en: They faced the ineluctable deadline together.
new_items.example_zh: 他們一起面對不可避免的死線。
new_items.label: new

new_items.example_en: A captious reviewer nitpicked every paragraph.
new_items.example_zh: 挑剔的審稿人對每段都吹毛求疵。
new_items.label: new

new_items.example_en: She is assiduous in her archival research.
new_items.example_zh: 她在檔案研究上非常勤勉。
new_items.label: new

new_items.en_definition: to make uneasy or embarrass; to thwart
new_items.example_en: The unexpected question seemed to discomfit him.
new_items.example_zh: 那個突如其來的問題讓他有些窘迫。
new_items.label: new

new_items.example_en: The mendacious report misled the public.
new_items.example_zh: 那份不實的報告誤導了大眾。
new_items.label: new

review_items.en_definition: to feel or express great loathing for
review_items.example_en: Citizens openly execrate systemic corruption.
review_items.example_zh: 民眾公開痛恨體制性的貪腐。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: A parsimonious budget cut key services.
review_items.example_zh: 過度節省的預算砍掉了重要服務。
review_items.label: review

review_items.en_definition: using too many words; tediously long
review_items.example_en: A prolix report buried the key points.
review_items.example_zh: 冗長的報告掩沒了重點。
review_items.label: review

review_items.en_definition: to reduce in force, effect, or thickness
review_items.example_en: Engineers attenuated the noise with better insulation.
review_items.example_zh: 工程師用更好的隔音來降低噪音。
review_items.label: review

review_items.en_definition: tending to change frequently; very versatile
review_items.example_en: A protean designer reinvented the interface.
review_items.example_zh: 那位多變的設計師改頭換面了介面。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: The room was redolent of fresh basil.
review_items.example_zh: 房間瀰漫著新鮮羅勒的香氣。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: She remained an implacable critic of the policy.
review_items.example_zh: 她始終是該政策不妥協的批評者。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: He resigned under intense public opprobrium.
review_items.example_zh: 在強大輿論譴責下他辭職了。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: She is reticent about personal matters.
review_items.example_zh: 她對私事一向寡言。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: The odd clue piqued her curiosity.
review_items.example_zh: 那條古怪的線索激起了她的好奇。
review_items.label: review

review_items.en_definition: eager or quick to argue or fight
review_items.example_en: A pugnacious debater took the stage.
review_items.example_zh: 一位好鬥的辯手走上台。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: A munificent gift kept the program alive.
review_items.example_zh: 一筆慷慨的捐助讓計畫得以延續。
review_items.label: review

review_items.en_definition: to win or regain favor by doing something pleasing
review_items.example_en: They sent gifts to propitiate the client.
review_items.example_zh: 他們送禮以安撫客戶、求重修舊好。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: He likes to hector junior staff into agreement.
review_items.example_zh: 他喜歡恐嚇菜鳥逼他們同意。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: She chose to dissemble about her next move.
review_items.example_zh: 她選擇對自己的下一步遮遮掩掩。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: Her pellucid prose clarified the concept.
review_items.example_zh: 她清澈易懂的文字釐清了概念。
review_items.label: review

review_items.en_definition: offensive, especially to the senses; harmful
review_items.example_en: A noisome stench seeped from the drains.
review_items.example_zh: 下水道滲出惡臭。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: The talk offered platitudes instead of plans.
review_items.example_zh: 演講只剩陳腔濫調，沒有方案。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: The essay felt jejune and superficial.
review_items.example_zh: 這篇文章顯得幼稚而淺薄。
review_items.label: review

review_items.en_definition: having or showing good judgment; wise
review_items.example_en: A sagacious mentor offered simple advice.
review_items.example_zh: 一位睿智的導師給了簡明建議。
review_items.label: review

items_shuffled.example_en: Residents remonstrated with city officials.
items_shuffled.example_zh: 居民向市府強烈抗議。
items_shuffled.label: new
